attributes.action: Enshrine in Law, the right to a charge free, in credit, Current Account
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the Thatcher Government, the Truck act was repealed, which gave every British Citizen the right to be paid in cash. This forced most people in to the hands of the financial institutions, to open an account.They now seek to charge us for the privilege of lending our money to them, the rationale being that other countries do not offer "free" banking.This should be part of basic human rights for all citizens of the world.
If without this right we have no alternative.
